title: 1.7.10海贼王模组，提交任务崩溃
author: wzh123123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-8-26 12:00 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I'm sorry, Dave.

Description: Exception in server tick loop

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
看上去这个 mod 应该是无法在服务器上使用
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/resources/I18n

如果能更新就更新

replies.txt_content:
